scripts.postversion: git checkout dev && git merge master && git push --all --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: git checkout master && git merge dev && npm test
scripts.test: npm run validate-base-config && npm run validate-test-config
scripts.validate-base-config: echo '// just validating base config' | eslint --no-eslintrc -c base.yaml --stdin
scripts.validate-test-config: echo '// just validating test config' | eslint --no-eslintrc -c test.yaml --stdin
